attributes.action: re-unite Ireland in time for the Centenary of partition (ie. 2022)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hong Kong reverted back to Chinese rule after 99 years, so Ireland should be re-united on the Centenary of partition (i.e. 2022) to complete the Republic, and therefore without influence from the UK. To set the timeframe at this stage would ease tension and allow the UK Government to create a 'hand-over' framework.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
